# [**Mapas de Calor**]{style="font-size:8pt"}

### [**Saltillo**]{style="color:#990000"}
```{r heatmap_saltillo}
densnv::mp_heatmap(geocoded_datasets = z,
                   cve_edo = "05",
                   locality = "Saltillo",
                   status_caso = c(1, 2),
                   week = c(1:53),
                   zoom = NULL,
                   map_type = NULL,
                   alpha = 0.6,
                   static = FALSE,
                   palette = viridis::turbo)
```
